intent: Check if Bridge CLI is accessible
example_output:
Usage: proton-bridge --cli [command]

Available commands:
  list       List accounts
  info       Show account info
  login      Log in to account
  logout     Log out of account
  change     Change account settings
notes: Non-interactive; safe to run as a readiness check
Accounts are numbered starting at 1. Look for 'connected' or 'disconnected' status.

intent: Get info for a specific account
example_output:
Account: user@proton.me
Status: connected
IMAP: 127.0.0.1:1143
SMTP: 127.0.0.1:1025
Mode: SSL
notes: Account index is 1-based from the list command

intent: Log out an account from Bridge
notes: Requires re-authentication in GUI mode to log back in
